resources.string:
Hi there! This is Sourav Chowdhury.


Desirous of a healthy and creative position,


or any other suitable profession to 

provide base level support for handling word processing, 

networking, application development, 

hardware, software installation, email, 

 and operating system related issues etc within strict deadlines. 

I have good communication skill both in Bangla and English 

and I can also work as a team player. 

Thank You!
